title: travelplanner: Could you devise a 7-day travel itinerary for two people, departing from Santa Ana and visiting three cities in Colorado from March 1st to March 7th, 2022? Our budget is set at $7,700. We require accommodations in the form of private rooms, and we will not be self-driving. For dining, we hold a preference for Italian, French, Chinese, and American cuisines. (c156d3b1f7c47cb4)

always_included_messages.content: Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.

chat_history.name: flight_search

chat_history.content:
### Day 1: Denver

**Arrival and Accommodation:**
You will be departing from Santa Ana on March 1st with various flight options, such as F3937737, F3937734, F3915414, F3915534, F3915716, F3937736, F3915775, or F3937739, all with a flight time of around 2 hours. The price ranges from $185 to $405. 

Once you reach Denver, you may choose from a range of accommodation options, including:
- The Harlem Cozy Nights - $457 for an entire home/apt
- Studio-Style Basement in Shared Apartment - $498 for a private room
- Bright room in Williamsburg loft - $636 for a private room
- Room in Spacious Williamsburg Loft - $934 for a private room
- GORGEOUS Newly-Renovated 2-BR Flat - $731 for an entire home/apt
- Peaceful, beautiful home away - $414 for an entire home/apt
- Big Sunny Bushwick Apartment - $714 for an entire home/apt
- *NO GUEST SERVICE FEE* Luxury Studio Suite with Free Continental Breakfast - $390 for an entire home/apt

**Dining:**
For dinner, you could opt for one of the following:
- The Fatty Bao - Asian Gastro Bar - offering a mix of cuisines including Indian, Bakery, BBQ, Cafe, and Seafood, and with an average cost of $93.
- Tasty Fare - serving French and BBQ, and rated 3.4 on average.
- Nukkadwala - with a rating of 0, serving desserts, tea, French, BBQ, and seafood.
- Al Yousuf - rated 3.7, offering tea, pizza, French, and American cuisines.
- Cafe Diva - a Chinese, cafe, and fast-food restaurant rated 3.8.
- New Town Cafe - Park Plaza - rated 4.1, serving American, BBQ, and fast food.

**Attractions:**
Denver has a range of attractions to explore. Here are some options:
- Denver Zoo - located at 2300 Steele St, Denver, CO 80205.
- Denver Botanic Gardens - at 1007 York St, Denver, CO 80206.
- Denver Art Museum - found at 100 W 14th Ave Pkwy, Denver, CO 80204.
- Denver Museum of Nature & Science - located at 2001 Colorado Blvd, Denver, CO 80205.
- Molly Brown House Museum - at 1340 Pennsylvania St, Denver, CO 80203.
- Elitch Gardens - situated at 2000 Elitch Cir, Denver, CO 80204.
- City Park - at 2001 Colorado Blvd, Denver, CO 80205.

### Day 2: Denver

**Attractions:**
Continue exploring Denver's attractions on day two:
- Big Blue Bear - at 750-776 14th St, Denver, CO 80202.
- Clyfford Still Museum - located at 1250 Bannock St, Denver, CO 80204.
- History Colorado Center - at 1200 Broadway, Denver, CO 80203.
- Historic Elitch Carousel Dome - found at 3775 Tennyson St, Denver, CO 80212.
- Colorado State Capitol - at 200 E Colfax Ave, Denver, CO 80203.
- Meow Wolf Denver | Convergence Station - located at 1338 1st St, Denver, CO 80204.
- Kirkland Museum of Fine & Decorative Art - at 1201 Bannock St, Denver, CO 80204.
- Forney Museum of Transportation - situated at 4303 Brighton Blvd, Denver, CO 80216.
- Four Mile Historic Park - at 715 S Forest St, Denver, CO 80246.
- Confluence Park - at 2250 15th St, Denver, CO 80202.

### Day 3: Denver to Colorado Springs

**Travel:**
You have multiple flight options to get from Denver to Colorado Springs on March 3rd, including F3809463, F3809582, F3839476, F3853284, F3906534, F3942178, F3942179, and F3942180. These flights will take around 30-45 minutes and cost between $18 and $35.

**Accommodation:**
Upon arrival in Colorado Springs, choose from the following accommodation options:
- Large sunny park slope apartment - an entire home/apt for $82
- HUGE CHEERFUL PRIVATE STUDIO SUITE WITH BACKYARD - an entire home/apt for $114
- Manhattan Midtown West 3B Apartment - an entire home/apt for $1178
- Charming and Bright 1 bdr apartment in Noho - an entire home/apt for $112
- 1Bedroom, 15-minute train ride to the Heart of NEW YORK - a private room for $274
- Cozy room in South Williamsburg BK - a private room for $783
- Bright and Sunny Room in Brand New Apt - a private room for $727
- Clean 1br w/Parking Incl., also 10 minutes near JFK/LGA - a private room for $483
- Quiet, tranquil room in the middle of everything! - a private room for $493

**Dining:**
For dining options in Colorado Springs, consider these restaurants:
- Raglan Road Irish Pub and Restaurant - rated 4.3, serving Chinese, bakery, pizza, and Mediterranean.
- Derby - rated 4.1, offering desserts and fast food.
- Club Tokyo - Best Western Skycity Hotel - rated 2.8, serving tea, bakery, Mediterranean, and fast food.
- Deepak Rasoi - rated 2.7, offering Chinese, pizza, and seafood.
- New Spice World - rated 2.9, serving French, bakery, fast food, and cafe.
- South Cafe - rated 3.5, serving desserts, French, BBQ, fast food, and Mediterranean.
- LIT Ultrabar - rated 3.6, serving cafe, Italian, fast food, Chinese, and seafood.
- Nobu - One&Only - rated 4.0, serving French, bakery, and seafood.

**Attractions:**
Some attractions to visit in Colorado Springs include:
- The Broadmoor Seven Falls - located at 1045 Lower Gold Camp Rd, Colorado Springs, CO 80905.
- Cheyenne Mountain Zoo - at 4250 Cheyenne Mountain Zoo Rd, Colorado Springs, CO 80906.
- Cave of the Winds Mountain Park - at 100 Cave of the Winds Rd, Manitou Springs, CO 80829.
- Ghost Town Museum - situated at 400 S 21st St, Colorado Springs, CO 80904.
- Garden of the Gods - located at Colorado Springs, CO 80904.
- North Cheyenne Cañon Park - at 2120 S Cheyenne Canyon Rd, Colorado Springs, CO 80906.
- Manitou Cliff Dwellings - at 10 Cliff Rd, Manitou Springs, CO 80829.

### Day 4: Colorado Springs

**Attractions:**
Continue exploring Colorado Springs:
- Will Rogers Shrine of the Sun - at 4250 Cheyenne Mountain Zoo Rd, Colorado Springs, CO 80906.
- Penrose Heritage Museum - located at 11 Lake Cir, Colorado Springs, CO 80906.
- Adventures Out West - at 925 S 8th St, Colorado Springs, CO 80905.
- Balanced Rock - at Garden Dr, Colorado Springs, CO 80904.
- Miramont Castle Museum and The Queen's Parlour Tea Room - at 9 Capitol Hill Ave, Manitou Springs, CO 80829.
- Cheyenne Mountain State Park - at 410 JL Ranch Heights Rd, Colorado Springs, CO 80926.
- Magic Town - located at 2418 W Colorado Ave, Colorado Springs, CO 80904.
- Kissing Camels - at 2336-3818 N 30th St, Colorado Springs, CO 80904.
- Western Museum of Mining & Industry - at 225 North Gate Blvd, Colorado Springs,

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
